ComicInfo.Summary: Sonja and her companions are traveling home to Sogoria when they are reunited with Melea and Xander who tell them of the horrors they faced in Koliostri's dungeon. With Sonja having vacated the throne of Emora, Koliostri quickly steps in and begins killing anyone who refuses to convert to his religion. Melea shows Sonja a secret path to the Temple of Qom where they kill Koliostri's followers and blow the place up. They also learn the names and locations of all of the acolytes who possess the explosive Eldar stones. Sonja returns to Nicolla and takes her throne back.
